attributes.title: Garbage🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app is the worst! I downloaded it to see beautiful Biden but I guess an idiot Cheeto changed the stupid app name🙄From being a beautiful app Biden 2020 it was renamed to Trump 2020 which is complete trash. Trump4dump 2020💘💗❤️❤️✨🙈💫Cheeto was staring at me with his scary rapist racist face 🤢🤢🤢🤚🏻 I swear Cheeto man always ruins apps🤦🏻‍♀️🤢🤢🙄

attributes.title: awful app
attributes.review: maybe the worst app i’ve ever interacted with in my life. stupid content and set up. it’s obvious that the people in charge are stupid too. don’t recommend for anyone. also. BLACK LIVES MATTER

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is disgusting once I opened the app and used it for a few minutes I started feeling sick this app is inappropriate I do not recommend it it’s horrible 1 Star

attributes.title: Ughhhh
attributes.review: I’m going to start off by saying this app is horrific it took HOURS just to download and on top of that it gave my phone a virus I had higher hopes for this app but I just got played again💕💕💕

attributes.title: The most horrible at app to ever be created
attributes.review: This app is so racist. I got pop ups on my screen saying White Lives Matter. There is no relevant info on this app. Who ever created this app can do better.

attributes.title: Worst thing to happen to humanity
attributes.review: Trump is a man of “business” he has no need to be in office and his way of going about this is trash.  He’s and outspoken person who has a vulgar mouth.   Don’t download the app.

attributes.title: False
attributes.review: Ya know what, I’m not a fan. The news that is put out by the app seems false and I don’t understand why a campaign app would put false information onto its app. Lol. The real fake news is this app

attributes.title: It kept crashing and wouldn’t let me sign in. Extremely frustrating
attributes.review: Wow extremely disappointed from my president

attributes.title: Horrible !!!
attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 stars I would !!!! It was horrible and it made me want to kms ! As soon as I opened the app I was really dissatisfied! I can’t believe Chetto man would allow this app to be a thing !!!! 😡!!!!

attributes.title: made my fruit perish
attributes.review: no literally the SECOND I downloaded this app every piece of fruit in my house INSTANTLY went brown. I didn’t even know that was possible. Is there a way to fix this?
